description: 07212021 Update, full display of kubernetes resources! Contains K8S overall resource overview, microservice resource details, Pod resource details and K8S network bandwidth, optimize the display of important indicators. https://github.com/APIZone

panels.description: Cluster node number, node POD number, node POD upper limit
panels.title: Node and Pod

matcher.options: (Memory Usage|Total Memory|Memory Request|Memory Limit|Disk Usage|Total Disk)

panels.title: Summary of Microservices and Pod Resources
The overall CPU usage of the microservice (container name) (maximum 100%)
The overall memory usage of the microservice (container name)
The overall memory usage of the microservice (container name)
Pod container CPU usage (can be associated with nodes)
Microservice and Pod resource graph (please check after specifying the microservice in the menu to avoid freezing)

targets.expr: sum (sum (rate (container_network_receive_bytes_total{origin_prometheus=~"$origin_prometheus",pod=~"$Pod",image!="",name=~"^k8s_.*",node=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"$NameSpace",pod=~".*$Container.*"}[2m])) by (pod)* on(pod)  group_right kube_pod_container_info) by(container) *8

sum (sum (rate (container_network_transmit_bytes_total{origin_prometheus=~"$origin_prometheus",pod=~"$Pod",image!="",name=~"^k8s_.*",node=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"$NameSpace",pod=~".*$Container.*"}[2m])) by (pod)* on(pod)  group_right kube_pod_container_info) by(container) *8

panels.title: Microservice (container name) network bandwidth per second (can be associated with nodes and Pods)

title: Kubernetes Metrics Dashboard
